The interim and provisional government promotes a fiscal bubble that will undermine the recovery of the economy and the population.
While announcing fiscal adjustment, it makes the rhombus grow R $ 125 billion until 2018. https://t.co/phq4Y4x49T
He asked Congress for a spending limit far beyond what was necessary. For what?
To have a real check of R $ 170 billion that allows "goodness" with the purpose of guaranteeing impeachment.
You're about to blow your spending limit. It goes back and only, under pressure, decides + serious issues like the readjustment of Bolsa Família (...)
(...) and the end of the extinction of the Ministry of Culture, for example.
It has neither fiscal responsibility nor social responsibility.
On the one hand, it breaks the prudential limits of spending and on the other hand wants to cut spending on health and education, privatize everything and sell the pre-salt.
Let's stay tuned. We will fight so that the population does not pay the blow duck.
